name: Keth
appearance: Reed hat, peat-stained boots, mirrored eyes from fen oils; speaks only in borrowed phrases.
character: Patient and eerie; kindness expressed through ferries given at the right moment.
talents: sensing where the marsh keeps secrets
flaws: cannot speak in his own words
haunted by others’ sorrows he has carried
reluctant to take coin up front
dreams: free the renegade covenant from Whisperfen’s waters
hear his own voice one last time
ferry the Night of Knots choir safely upriver
secrets: knows the exact pylon where House Veyron’s oath-night was replayed
once ferried a Mnemos schismatic who carried the ledger-leaf that could topple Veyron
has tied knots that answer questions he fears to ask
